amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 115-212 to authorize the U.S. Bureau of Reclamation to develop a study to enhance mountain runoff to Central Valley Project reservoirs from headwaters restoration activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Costa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Costa amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
